pr_title: DHFPROD-5537:Default to step 1 if flow name and step are not provided

timeline.bodyText: Can you add an assertion on the Job document that gets created (which unfortunately is left in an unfinished state) on flowName = default-ingestion? I'm guessing that's not tested anywhere, so would be good to test here. There's no indication that the first step was run, although that's implied by the flow finishing successfully.
timeline.author: rjrudin
